summary: Performers in a Budapest sideshow encounter love, greed, and murder.
cast: John Gilbert|Renée Adorée|Lionel Barrymore|Edward Connelly|Gertrude Short|Andy MacLennan|Agostino Borgato|Betty Boyd|Barbara Bozoky|Jules Cowles|Jacqueline Gadsdon|Cecil Holland|Bobbie Mack|Ida May|Polly Moran|Russ Powell|Francis Powers|Billy Seay|Dorothy Seay|Dorothy Sebastian|Eddie Sturgis|Edna Tichenor|Kit Wain|Zalla Zarana
title: El palacio de las maravillas
